mapper.select: SELECT SUM(case when inOrOut=1 then t.tranAmt else 0 END) incomeAmt, SUM(case when inOrOut=0 then t.tranAmt else 0 END) costAmt FROM TB_FEE_LOG t WHERE t.tranDate >= #{startDate}
SELECT sum(t.payAmt) consumeCashAmt, sum(t.costAmt) consumeCostAmt FROM TB_MALL_ORDER_INFO t WHERE t.cashDate >= #{startDate} and t.cashType in ('0','1') and t.payStatus=1

SELECT t.cashDate AS xAxis, sum(t.nums) AS salesNums, sum(t.payAmt) salesAmt, sum(t.costAmt) costAmt FROM TB_MALL_ORDER_INFO t WHERE t.cashType IN ('0', '1') and t.payStatus=1 GROUP BY t.cashDate ORDER BY t.cashDate LIMIT 30

SELECT CONCAT(t.i_year,'年第',t.i_season,'季度') AS xAxis, sum(t.nums) AS salesNums, sum(t.payAmt) salesAmt, sum(t.costAmt) costAmt FROM TB_MALL_ORDER_INFO t WHERE t.cashType IN ('0', '1') and t.payStatus=1 AND t.i_year >= #{i_year} GROUP BY t.i_year, t.i_season ORDER BY t.i_year, t.i_season

SELECT CONCAT( t.i_year, '年', t.i_month, '月' ) AS xAxis, sum(t.nums) AS salesNums, sum(t.payAmt) salesAmt, sum(t.costAmt) costAmt FROM TB_MALL_ORDER_INFO t WHERE t.cashType IN ('0', '1') and t.payStatus=1 GROUP BY t.i_year, t.i_month ORDER BY t.i_year, t.i_month LIMIT 12
